name: oj-module
description: Navigational element that manages content replacement within a particular region of the page.

animation.description: Defines animation object used for view transitions.

cleanupMode.description: The cleanup mode for the view.

none.description: Use the setting to preserve the view, e.g. if the view and view model will be stored in external cache.

onDisconnect.description: The View nodes will be destroyed on disconnect.

ojTransitionStart.description: Triggered before transition to the new View is started

ojViewConnected.description: Triggered after the View is inserted into the DOM

viewModel.description: ViewModel for the View being attached to the DOM.

ojTransitionEnd.description: Triggered after transition to the new View is complete

ojViewDisconnected.description: Triggered after the View is removed from the DOM

viewModel.description: An array of DOM nodes that represent the disconnected View. The application can use the nodes to store them in cache.
